outputs.output_descr: Build capacities of key institutions and relevant line departments working on forests, biodiversity and wildlife governance to deal with emerging challenges related to biodiversity conservation such as climate change, enhance access of local communities to natural resources in view of the new laws and multiple land  uses. Strengthen capacities of institutions for effective implementation of the mandate of the Convention on Biological Diversity, Nagoya Protocol and the Biological Diversity Act, 2002. Support Ministry of Environment and Forests in identifying, documenting and disseminating numerous good practices of biodiversity governance from across India.
